Aaron McCollough

poet. writer. publisher.




Aaron McCollough was raised in Tennessee. He currently works as the Director of George Mason University Press and the Mason Publishing Unit at George Mason University Library and lives in Alexandria, VA. He is also the co-publisher, with Karla Kelsey, of SplitLevel Texts. Previously, he was the Librarian for English Literature and Comparative Literature at the University of Michigan, the Editorial Director at the University of Michigan Press, and the Head of the Scholarly Communication and Publishing unit at the University of Illinois Library.

Please direct all correspondence to: amccollo71@gmail.com
